mapper.insert: CREATE TEMP TABLE "DbWT1111KyufuJisseki" ( "renban" smallint, "kokanJohoShikibetsuNo" character(40), "nyuryokuShikibetsuNo" character varying(40), "recordShubetsuCode" character varying(40), "kyufuJissekiSakuseiKubunCode" character varying(40), "serviceTeikyoYM" rshare."UDD014YM", "kyufuJissekiKubun" character varying(40), "jigyoshoNo" rgdb."DbUDD004JigyoshaNo", "seiriNo" character varying(10), "recordKensuH1" smallint, "recordKensuD1" smallint, "recordKensuDD" smallint, "recordKensuD2" smallint, "recordKensuDC" smallint, "recordKensuD3" smallint, "recordKensuD4" smallint, "recordKensuD5" smallint, "recordKensuD6" smallint, "recordKensuD7" smallint, "recordKensuD8" smallint, "recordKensuDE" smallint, "recordKensuT1" smallint, "recordKensuD9" smallint, "recordKensuDA" smallint, "recordKensuDB" smallint, "keikokuKubunCode" character varying(40), "hokenshaNo" rgdb."DbUDD003HokenshaNo", "hokenshaName" character varying(40), "jigyoshaName" character varying(40), "nyuryokuShikibetsuMeisho" character varying(40) )

INSERT INTO "DbWT1111KyufuJisseki" VALUES ( #{連番}, #{交換情報識別番号}, #{入力識別番号}, #{レコード種別コード}, #{給付実績情報作成区分コード}, #{サービス提供年月}, #{給付実績区分}, #{事業所番号}, #{整理番号}, #{件数_H1}, #{件数_D1}, #{件数_DD}, #{件数_D2}, #{件数_DC}, #{件数_D3}, #{件数_D4}, #{件数_D5}, #{件数_D6}, #{件数_D7}, #{件数_D8}, #{件数_DE}, #{件数_T1}, #{件数_D9}, #{件数_DA}, #{件数_DB}, #{警告区分コード}, #{コントロールレコード保険者番号}, #{コントロールレコード保険者名}, #{事業者名称}, #{入力識別名称})
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM "DbWT1111KyufuJisseki" AS DbWT1111 INNER JOIN "DbWT0001Hihokensha" AS DbWT0001 ON DbWT1111."renban" = DbWT0001."meisaiRenban" ${出力順}

select.id: select事業者名称関連リスト

mapper.select:
SELECT ,
FROM "DbWT1111KyufuJisseki" AS DbWT1111 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT 事業者１.* FROM rgdb."DbT7060KaigoJigyosha" AS 事業者１ WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 'X' FROM rgdb."DbT7060KaigoJigyosha" AS 事業者２ WHERE 事業者１."jigyoshaNo" = 事業者２."jigyoshaNo" AND 事業者１."yukoKaishiYMD" < 事業者２."yukoKaishiYMD" ) ) AS 事業者１ ON DbWT1111."jigyoshoNo" = 事業者１."jigyoshaNo" WHERE DbWT1111."jigyoshoNo" IS NOT NULL AND DbWT1111."jigyoshoNo" != ''

select.id: select入力識別名称関連リスト

mapper.select:
SELECT ,
FROM "DbWT1111KyufuJisseki" AS DbWT1111 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT 識別番号管理１.* FROM rgdb."DbT3118ShikibetsuNoKanri" AS 識別番号管理１ WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 'X' FROM rgdb."DbT3118ShikibetsuNoKanri" AS 識別番号管理２ WHERE 識別番号管理１."shikibetsuNo" = 識別番号管理２."shikibetsuNo" AND 識別番号管理１."tekiyoKaishiYM" < 識別番号管理２."tekiyoKaishiYM" ) ) AS 識別番号管理１ ON DbWT1111."nyuryokuShikibetsuNo" = 識別番号管理１."shikibetsuNo"
